SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE log_info SET id=@@id@@% <%=,chain_id=@@chain_id@@%>,<%=,content=@@content@@%>,<%=,interface_name=@@interface_name@@%>,<%=,type=@@type@@%>,<%=,creation_time=@@creation_time@@%>,<%=,ip=@@ip@@%> WHERE id=@@id@@%;

SELECT id,chain_id,content,interface_name,type,creation_time,ip FROM log_info WHERE 1=1 <%= AND id=@@id@@%> <%= AND chain_id=@@chain_id@@%> <%= AND content=@@content@@%> <%= AND interface_name=@@interface_name@@%> <%= AND type=@@type@@%> <%= AND creation_time=@@creation_time@@%> <%= AND ip=@@ip@@%>;

SELECT id,chain_id,content,interface_name,type,creation_time,ip FROM log_info WHERE 1=1 <%= AND id=@@id@@%> <%= AND chain_id=@@chain_id@@%> <%= AND content=@@content@@%> <%= AND interface_name=@@interface_name@@%> <%= AND type=@@type@@%> <%= AND creation_time=@@creation_time@@%> <%= AND ip=@@ip@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM log_info WHERE 1=1 <%= AND id=@@id@@%> <%= AND chain_id=@@chain_id@@%> <%= AND content=@@content@@%> <%= AND interface_name=@@interface_name@@%> <%= AND type=@@type@@%> <%= AND creation_time=@@creation_time@@%> <%= AND ip=@@ip@@%>;
